alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Carter; Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 12:27PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Boyd, Greenup and Carter Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grayson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ashland, Grayson, Olive Hill, Cannonsburg, Grayson Lake State Park, Carter Caves State Park, Kenova, Catlettsburg, Ceredo, Greenup, Princess, Coalton, Denton, Gesling, Greenbo Lake, Oldtown, Naples, Rush, Load and Franklin Furnace. This includes Interstate 64 in Kentucky between mile markers 149 and 190. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
